author: Tim Marcin
title: 2020 Tokyo Olympics have been postponed to 2021 because of coronavirus
description: It was practically inevitable. The 2020 Summer Olympics in Tokyo, scheduled to take place this summer, have been postponed due to the coronavirus pandemic. Thomas Bach, president of the International Olympic Committee (IOC), and Japan Prime Minister Shinzo Ab…
content:
It was practically inevitable. The 2020 Summer Olympics in Tokyo, scheduled to take place this summer, have been postponed due to the coronavirus pandemic.
